import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { render } from 'react-dom'; import './SearchBox.css'; import { Card, Icon, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react'; class SearchBox extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) const movies = [ {id: "1", title: "Shaolin Soccer", poster: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/3/3e/ShaolinSoccerFilmPoster.jpg/220px-ShaolinSoccerFilmPoster.jpg"}, {id: "2", title: "GOAL 2", poster: "https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/51D%2BKYxbntL.jpg"}, ] var movieRows = [] movies.forEach((movie) =>{ console.log(movie.title) const movieRow =
{movie.title} 2015 Matthew is a musician living in Nashville. 2h 49m
movieRows.push(movieRow) }) this.state = {rows: movieRows} } render(){ return (

MoviesXd

    {this.state.rows}
Matthew Joined in 2015 Matthew is a musician living in Nashville. 22 Friends
) } } export default SearchBox;
